summary.span: Represents a point in time, typically expressed as a date and time of day, relative to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

span.span: Represents a point in time, typically expressed as a date and time of day, relative to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 结构包括值以及属性，用于定义当前之间的差异实例的日期和时间与协调世界时 (UTC)。The structure includes a value, together with an property that defines the difference between the current instance's date and time and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 因为它完全定义的日期和时间相对于 UTC，结构不包括`Kind`成员，作为结构。Because it exactly defines a date and time relative to UTC, the structure does not include a `Kind` member, as the structure does. 它表示日期和时间值采用 UTC 范围从 12:00:00 年 1 月 1 日午夜 0001 公元 （基督纪元） 到 11:59:59 PM，公元 9999 年 12 月 31 日It represents dates and times with values whose UTC ranges from 12:00:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 Anno Domini (Common Era), to 11:59:59 P.M., December 31, 9999 A.D. (C.E.)。(C.E.). 时间部分值的单位为 100 毫微秒为单位调用个时钟周期，和特定日期是自午夜 12:00 到公元 0001 年 1 月 1 日以来的计时周期数The time component of a value is measured in 100-nanosecond units called ticks, and a particular date is the number of ticks since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 0001 A.D. (C.E.)在日历。(C.E.) in the calendar. A值始终表示中的上下文显式或默认日历。A value is always expressed in the context of an explicit or default calendar. 中的刻度总数不包括归因于闰秒的刻度。Ticks that are attributable to leap seconds are not included in the total number of ticks. > [!NOTE] > 如果你正在使用计时周期值是否想要转换为其他时间间隔，如分钟或秒，应使用， ， ， ，或常量，以执行转换。If you are working with a ticks value that you want to convert to some other time interval, such as minutes or seconds, you should use the , , , , or constant to perform the conversion. 例如，若要添加的秒数表示通过指定到的计时周期数组件的值，你可以使用表达式`dateValue.Second + nTicks/Timespan.TicksPerSecond`。For example, to add the number of seconds represented by a specified number of ticks to the component of a value, you can use the expression `dateValue.Second + nTicks/Timespan.TicksPerSecond`. 尽管值包含一个偏移量，它不是完全时区感知数据结构。Although a value includes an offset, it is not a fully time zone-aware data structure. 一个特征的时区相对于 UTC 的偏移量时，它并不明确地标识一个时区。While an offset from UTC is one characteristic of a time zone, it does not unambiguously identify a time zone. 不仅执行多个时区具有相同的偏移量从 UTC，但如果它遵循夏令时的单个时区偏移量更改。Not only do multiple time zones share the same offset from UTC, but the offset of a single time zone changes if it observes daylight saving time. 这意味着，只要值与其时区不再关联时，它可以不再明确链接回其原始的时区。This means that, as soon as a value is disassociated from its time zone, it can no longer be unambiguously linked back to its original time zone. 因为是一种结构，对象已声明但从未初始化为其成员字段的每个包含默认值。Because is a structure, a object that has been declared but not otherwise initialized contains the default values for each of its member fields. 这意味着，其属性设置为及其属性设置为。This means that its property is set to and its property is set to . 你可以创建一个新值通过调用其构造函数，它类似于重载构造函数的重载任一结构。You can create a new value by calling any of the overloads of its constructor, which are similar to the overloaded constructors for the structure. 你还可以创建一个新为其分配的值值。You can also create a new value by assigning it a value. 这是隐式转换;不需要强制转换运算符 （在 C# 中) 或调用转换方法 （在 Visual Basic 中)。This is an implicit conversion; it does not require a casting operator (in C#) or call to a conversion method (in Visual Basic). 也可以初始化值的字符串表示形式的日期和时间通过调用静态字符串分析方法，包括多种， ， ，和。You can also initialize a value from the string representation of a date and time by calling a number of static string parsing methods, which include , , , and . 成员结构提供以下几个方面的功能：The members of the structure provide functionality in the following areas: - 日期和时间运算。Date and time arithmetic. 你可以添加或减去日期或从特定的时间间隔值。You can add or subtract either dates or time intervals from a particular value. 使用算术运算值，与具有不同值，调整的时间偏移量存在差异时返回结果。Arithmetic operations with values, unlike those with values, adjust for differences in time offsets when returning a result. 例如，下面的代码使用变量要减去的当前的 UTC 时间从当前的本地时间。For example, the following code uses variables to subtract the current local time from the current UTC time. 该代码将使用变量以执行相同的操作。The code then uses variables to perform the same operation. 与减法值返回 UTC，从本地时区的差异时与减法值返回。The subtraction with values returns the local time zone's difference from UTC, while the subtraction with values returns . [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Type/cs/Type.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Type#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Type/vb/Type.vb#1)] - 类型转换操作。Type conversion operations. 你可以将转换值复制到值，反之亦然。You can convert values to values and vice versa. - 时间操作和提取操作。Time manipulation and extraction operations. 你可以提取日期或时间值。You can extract either the date or the time of a value. 您还可以检索特定的值组件，如其年份或月份。You can also retrieve the value of a particular component, such as its year or its month. - 日期和时间转换。Date and time conversion. 你可以将任何转换到另一个的值表示另一时区中的时间相同点的值。You can convert any value to another value that represents the same point in time in another time zone. 但是，仅在的情况下应用时区的调整规则方法，后者将转换本地系统区域中的为日期和时间值。However, a time zone's adjustment rules are applied only in the case of the method, which converts a value to the date and time in the local system zone. - 日期和时间的比较。Date and time comparison. 你可以确定是否有任何特定值是早于、 等于还是晚于另一个值。You can determine whether any particular value is earlier than, the same as, or later than another value. 进行比较之前，所有值都会都转换为 UTC。Before the comparison is performed, all values are converted to UTC.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `year`， `month`， `day`， `hour`， `minute`， `second`，和`millisecond`所有参数都反映指定的日历表示的值`calendar`参数。The `year`, `month`, `day`, `hour`, `minute`, `second`, and `millisecond` parameters all reflect values expressed in the calendar specified by the `calendar` parameter. 如果这些值构成的日期和时间，无法表示通过使用此日历，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if these values form a date and time that cannot be expressed by using this calendar. ## Examples 下面的示例使用这两者的实例类和要实例化类值。The following example uses instances of both the class and the class to instantiate a value. 然后向控制台中使用各自的日历和公历日历显示日期。That date is then displayed to the console using the respective calendars and the Gregorian calendar. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用方法在单个操作中添加多个一种类型的时间间隔 （天、 小时、 分钟、 秒或毫秒为单位）。You can use the method to add more than one kind of time interval (days, hours, minutes, seconds, or milliseconds) in a single operation. 此方法的行为等同于加法运算符。This method's behavior is identical to the addition operator. 结构还支持专用的加法 (如， ，和) 为每个时间间隔。The structure also supports specialized addition methods (such as , , and ) for each time interval. > [!NOTE] > 此方法返回一个新对象。This method returns a new object. 它不会修改当前对象的值加上`timeSpan`为其日期和时间。It does not modify the value of the current object by adding `timeSpan` to its date and time. 方法不会影响的当前值对象的属性。The method does not affect the value of the current object's property. 因为对象不表示的日期和时间以特定时区，方法不考虑特定时区的调整规则执行日期和时间运算时。Because a object does not represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it performs date and time arithmetic. 如果`timeSpan`参数是`null`，此方法返回的原始值对象保持不变。If the `timeSpan` parameter is `null`, this method returns the value of the original object unchanged. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组表示目标之间的航班时间的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that represent the flight times between destinations. 方法然后将添加到这些时段表示航班的初始起飞时间的对象。The method then adds these times to a object that represents a flight's initial takeoff time. 结果在每个目标反映计划的到达时间。The result reflects the scheduled arrival time at each destination. remarks.format: ## Remarks 小数部分`days`参数是一天的小数部分。The fractional part of the `days` parameter is the fractional part of a day. 例如，4.5 相当于 4 天 12 小时，0 分钟，0 秒，0 毫秒。For example, 4.5 is equivalent to 4 days, 12 hours, 0 minutes, 0 seconds, 0 milliseconds. `days`参数舍入为最接近的毫秒。The `days` parameter is rounded to the nearest millisecond. > [!NOTE] > 此方法返回一个新对象。This method returns a new object. 它不会修改当前对象的值加上`days`为其日期和时间。It does not modify the value of the current object by adding `days` to its date and time. 因为对象不表示的日期和时间以特定时区，方法不考虑特定时区的调整规则执行日期和时间运算时。Because a object does not represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it performs date and time arithmetic. 小于一天的时间间隔转换为一小部分可能涉及精度损失。Converting time intervals of less than a day to a fraction can involve a loss of precision. 如果这有问题，则可以使用方法，它使你可以在单个方法调用中指定的时间间隔的多个类型并无需转换为一天的小数部分的时间间隔。If this is problematic, you can use the method, which enables you to specify more than one kind of time interval in a single method call and eliminates the need to convert time intervals to fractional parts of a day. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法列出星期一，2008 年 3 月中的工作星期开始的日期。The following example uses the method to list the dates that fall on Monday, the start of the work week, in March 2008. (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。(C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). Windows 使用的文件时间应用程序创建、 访问，或将写入文件时进行记录。Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file. Windows 文件时间可直接访问通过 Windows API 通过调用`GetFileTime`函数，返回`FILETIME`结构。A Windows file time is directly accessible through the Windows API by calling the `GetFileTime` function, which returns a `FILETIME` structure. 单个函数参数是要检索其文件时间信息的文件句柄。The single function parameter is the handle of the file whose file time information is to be retrieved. 通过调用检索的文件句柄`CreateFile`函数。The file handle is retrieved by calling the `CreateFile` function. `FILETIME`结构的`dwHighDateTime`成员包含的文件时间的四个高序位字节并将其`dwLowDateTime`成员包含四个低序位字节。The `FILETIME` structure's `dwHighDateTime` member contains the four high-order bytes of the file time, and its `dwLowDateTime` member contains the four low-order bytes. 下面的示例演示如何检索 Windows 文件时间值并将它们转换为值。The example that follows illustrates how to retrieve Windows file time values and convert them to values. 也可以从创建 Windows 文件时间值值通过调用和方法，并从值通过调用方法。Windows file time values can also be created from values by calling the and methods, and from values by calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 Windows API 检索写字板可执行文件的 Windows 文件时间。The following example uses the Windows API to retrieve the Windows file times for the WordPad executable. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如有必要，属性将转换当前对象的日期和时间为本地系统的日期和时间。If necessary, the property converts the current object's date and time to the local system's date and time. 转换是一个包含两个步骤操作：The conversion is a two-step operation: 1. 该属性将当前对象的时间为协调世界时 (UTC)。The property converts the current object's time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 2. 然后，该属性将 UTC 转换为本地时间。The property then converts UTC to local time. 没有任何无效的时间，并且不明确的时间映射到本地时区的标准时间。There are no invalid times and ambiguous times are mapped to the local zone's standard time. (但是，转换可能出现反常： 如果派生从本地计算机的值反映了不明确的日期和时间，值可以转换为 UTC，然后再为本地时间不同于原始的时间。)执行此转换时，属性适用的本地时区的任何调整规则。(However, the conversion can create an anomaly: if a value that is derived from the local computer reflects an ambiguous date and time, that value can be converted to UTC and then back to a local time that differs from the original time.) The property applies any adjustment rules in the local time zone when it performs this conversion. 此属性返回的日期和时间部分对象，使其非常适合到转换。This property returns both the date and the time component of a object, which makes it useful for to conversion. 除了执行任何必要的时间转换，此属性不同于通过设置的值的属性属性返回对象传递给。In addition to performing any necessary time conversion, this property differs from the property by setting the value of the property of the returned object to . ## Examples 下面的示例演示的一些转换到美国的本地时间的值太平洋标准时区运行。The following example illustrates several conversions of values to local times in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone. 请注意，最后三次所有不明确;该属性将所有这些映射到单个日期和时区的太平洋标准时间的时间。Note that the last three times are all ambiguous; the property maps all of them to a single date and time in the Pacific Standard Time zone. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此常量的值为 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM + 00:00。The value of this constant is 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM +00:00. 属性用于确定是否的新值对象或算术运算返回的值是相同等于或早于此最大范围值。The property is used to determine whether the value of a new object or the value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or earlier than this maximum range value. 如果不是这样，该方法将引发。If it is not, the method throws an . 任何值转换为协调世界时 (UTC)，该方法将其与进行比较之前。Any value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method compares it with . 这意味着，值，其日期和时间是接近最大范围，但其偏移量为负，可能会引发异常。This means that a value whose date and time are close to the maximum range, but whose offset is negative, may throw an exception. 例如，值 12/31/9999 11:00 PM-02:00 不在范围内，因为它是一小时晚于时转换为 UTC。For example, the value 12/31/9999 11:00 PM -02:00 is out of range because it is one hour later than when it is converted to UTC. 如日历，支持早于上部日期范围。Some calendars, such as the , support an upper date range that is earlier than . 在这些情况下，尝试访问变量赋值或格式设置和分析操作中可以引发。In these cases, trying to access in variable assignments or formatting and parsing operations can throw an . 而不是检索的值的，你可以检索由指定的区域性的最新的有效日期值的值属性。Instead of retrieving the value of , you can retrieve the value of the specified culture's latest valid date value from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分析一个具有三个元素，可以按任意顺序出现，并且用空白分隔字符串。 parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 这三个要素是下表中所示。These three elements are as shown in the following table. |元素Element|示例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<时间 >\|"1:02:03 PM""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移量 > 不能单独出现。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必须提供一起\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换到基于值的当前区域性的当前日历中每一年属性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. \<偏移量 > 可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。\ can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol. `input`通过使用中的格式设置信息分析字符串初始化为当前区域性的对象。The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a object that is initialized for the current culture. 若要分析包含指定的格式设置，不一定对应于当前区域性的格式设置字符串，请使用方法并提供的格式说明符。To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to the formatting of the current culture, use the method and provide a format specifier. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法，以便分析多个日期和时间的字符串。The following example calls the method to parse several date and time strings. 该示例包括从 2007 年 3 月 22 日，输出区域性为 en 的系统上的我们。The example includes output from March 22, 2007, on a system whose culture is en-us. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法分析具有三个元素，可以按任意顺序出现，并且用空白分隔字符串。This method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 下表中显示这些三个元素。These three elements are shown in the following table. |元素Element|示例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<时间 >\|"1:02:03 PM""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移量 > 不能单独出现。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必须提供一起\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换为一年`provider`参数的当前日历的值基于属性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. \<偏移量 > 可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。\ can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol. 这三个元素的格式由定义`formatProvider`可以为以下对象之一的参数：The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following: - default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换为一年`provider`参数的当前日历的值基于属性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量或如果或中指定值`styles`参数。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone, or if either the or value is specified in the `styles` parameter. 如果\<偏移量 > 存在，它可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。If \ is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol. 这三个元素的格式由定义`formatProvider`可以为以下对象之一的参数：The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following: - A表示的格式设置中使用的区域性的对象`input`参数。A remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的字符串表示形式必须是定义的格式的日期`format`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter. 它还要求\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移量 > 元素的字符串表示形式的日期和时间显示在指定的顺序中`format`。It also requires that the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`. 如果`input`字符串与这都不匹配`format`参数，该方法将引发。If the `input` string does not match this `format` parameter, the method throws a . 与此相反，方法分析的字符串表示形式中任何一种识别的格式提供程序的格式的日期对象。In contrast, the method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's object. 此外允许\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移量 > 元素的字符串表示形式要按任何顺序显示的日期和时间。 also allows the \, \, and \ elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order. `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符`input`参数。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of the `input` parameter. 有关有效格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配午夜的时间 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象分配本地系统上的当前日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量，生成对象分配的本地系统时区偏移量。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the resulting object is assigned the time zone offset of the local system. 特定日期和时间符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数，则精确格式`input`如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符字符串。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, as is the precise format of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以为下列操作之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A表示的区域性的对象在其上基于`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 对象由其属性定义的符号和中的格式设置`input`。The object returned by its property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用与要分析多个日期和时间字符串的标准和自定义格式说明符和固定区域性的方法。The following example uses the method with standard and custom format specifiers and the invariant culture to parse several date and time strings. property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串，指示无显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串分析的方式，并且支持在分析操作的一部分进行 UTC 转换。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员枚举支持除外。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出的每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量的值，则会为所返回的对象提供的本地时区偏移量。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量的值，则会为所返回的对象都提供了的 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法分析的字符串表示形式符合任一分配到的模式的日期`formats`参数。The method parses the string representation of a date that matches any one of the patterns assigned to the `formats` parameter. 如果`input`字符串不与任一这些模式不匹配与任意所定义的变体`styles`参数，该方法将引发。If the `input` string does not match any one of these patterns with any of the variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a . 除了比较`input`到多个格式设置模式，此重载行为类似方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple formatting patterns, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义的可能模式的`input`参数。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of the `input` parameter. 当调用该方法时，`input`必须匹配这些模式之一。When the method is called, `input` must match one of these patterns. 有关有效格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If the matched element in `formats` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发。If the sign is missing, the method throws a . > [!IMPORTANT] > 使用`formats`的此重载来指定多种格式的参数可以帮助减少在输入日期和时间时，许多用户遇到的挫折。Using the `formats` parameter of this overload to specify multiple formats can help reduce the frustration many users experience when they enter dates and times. 具体而言，应用程序，以处理日期和时间的表示形式，可以包括或缺少前导零中月份、 天、 小时、 分钟和秒可以定义多个输入的模式的功能。In particular, the ability to define multiple input patterns enables an application to handle date and time representations that can either include or lack leading zeros in months, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. 该示例提供这样的一个示例。The example provides an illustration of this. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配午夜的时间 (0: 00:00)。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象分配本地系统上的当前日期。If the matched element in `formats` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不要求`input`包含偏移量，所产生的偏移量对象依赖于的值`styles`参数。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果未指定任何值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和时间符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 同样适用于的确切格式`input`，如果匹配的元素的`formats`是一个标准格式说明符字符串。The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if the matching element of `formats` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以为下列操作之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A表示的区域性的对象在其上基于`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回对象属性定义的符号和中的格式设置`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`. - A定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串，指示无显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串分析的方式，并且支持在分析操作的一部分进行 UTC 转换。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is permitted in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员枚举支持除外。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出的每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||分析`input`并且，如果有必要，请将其转换为 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相当于解析字符串，并调用方法的返回对象。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不要求`input`包含偏移量的值，则会为所返回的对象提供的本地时区偏移量。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认值。This is the default value.| ||如果中的匹配的元素`formats`不要求`input`包含偏移量的值，则会为所返回的对象都提供了的 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If the matched element in `formats` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`若要包含未指定的内部空白`format`。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by `format`. 额外的空白区域日期和时间的组件之间和在 （偏移量），除外的各个组件内可能出现，并分析此字符串时被忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except the offset), and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包括尾随空格不指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含前导、 尾随和内部未由指定的空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `formats`. 未在中的匹配元素中指定的所有额外空白字符`formats`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 空白区域必须完全按照中的某个特定元素指定的方式`formats`地发生匹配。White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element of `formats` for a match to occur. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||没有任何作用因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下面的示例定义了多个输入的格式的字符串表示形式的日期和时间和偏移量的值，并随后将传递到用户输入的字符串方法。The following example defines multiple input formats for the string representation of a date and time and offset value, and then passes the string that is entered by the user to the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将转换同时对象为协调世界时 (UTC)，然后再计算分隔它们的时间间隔。This method converts both objects to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before calculating the time interval that separates them. 这将删除不同于 UTC 的偏移量可能会对比较产生任何影响。This removes any effect that different offsets from UTC may have on the comparison. > [!NOTE] > 对于支持自定义运算符的语言，你还可以通过使用减法运算符执行日期和时间的减法。For languages that support custom operators, you can also perform date and time subtraction by using the subtraction operator. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法。For details, see the method. 因为既不当前对象也不`value`参数表示的日期和时间以特定时区，方法不考虑特定时区的调整规则的日期和时间相减时。Because neither the current object nor the `value` parameter represent the date and time in a specific time zone, the method does not consider a particular time zone's adjustment rules when it subtracts dates and times. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用的减法方法。The following example illustrates subtraction that uses the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行转换为本地时间，该方法首先将当前对象的日期和时间为协调世界时 (UTC) 通过减去从时间偏移量。In performing the conversion to local time, the method first converts the current object's date and time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by subtracting the offset from the time. 它然后将转换的 UTC 日期和时间为本地时间通过添加本地时区偏移量。It then converts the UTC date and time to local time by adding the local time zone offset. 在执行此操作，它采用本地时区的任何调整规则的帐户。In doing this, it takes account of any adjustment rules for the local time zone. 这两个值的当前对象和的值方法调用所返回的对象表示的时间相同的点。Both the value of the current object and the value of the object returned by the method call represent the same point in time. 也就是说，如果同时传递给方法，该方法将返回`true`。That is, if both are passed to the method, the method will return `true`. 如果转换会导致超出范围的时间类型，方法返回对象，具有日期和时间设置为或以及设置为本地时区偏移量的偏移量。If the conversion causes a time that is out of range of the type, the method returns a object that has the date and time set to either or and the offset set to the local time zone offset. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法将转换为太平洋标准时区中的本地时间的值。The following example uses the method to convert a value to local time in the Pacific Standard Time zone. 它还说明了对本地时区的调整规则的方法的支持。It also illustrates the method's support for the local time zone's adjustment rules. remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数应包含单个格式说明符 (请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自定义格式模式 (请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md))，它定义返回字符串的格式。The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) that defines the format of the returned string. 如果`format`为 null 或为空字符串 ("")，则值使用默认格式的输出。If `format` is a null or empty string (""), the value is output using the default format. 下表显示某些格式说明符一起使用时的确切操作，这不同于其行为与一起使用时。The following table shows the exact operation of certain format specifiers when used with , which differs from their behavior when used with . |现有的格式说明符Existing format specifier|新行为New behavior| |-------------------------------|------------------| |“K”"K"|设计往返日期和时间。Designed to round-trip a date and time. 与，映射到"zzz"（偏移量始终显示为带有小时和分钟）。With , maps to "zzz" (the offset is always displayed with hours and minutes). 请注意，"K"自定义格式说明符;它不能显示为单个字符`format`。Note that "K" is a custom format specifier; it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.| |“U”"U"|不支持。Not supported.| |"r""r"|将转换对象为协调世界时 (UTC)，并输出使用自定义格式字符串`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。Converts the object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.| |“u”"u"|将转换为 UTC 的对象，并输出使用格式`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。Converts the object to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.| 其余的标准日期和时间格式说明符的行为相同，但有方法像它们对待方法。The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the method as they do with the method. 此方法使用派生自当前区域性的格式设置信息。This method uses formatting information derived from the current culture. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples 下面的示例显示到控制台中使用的每个标准日期和时间格式说明符的对象。The following example displays a object to the console using each of the standard date and time format specifiers. 通过使用 en 设置输出的格式的区域性。The output is formatted by using the en-us culture. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/cs/ToString.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/vb/ToString.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `format`参数应包含单个格式说明符 (请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) 或自定义格式模式 (请参阅[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)).The `format` parameter should contain either a single format specifier character (see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)) or a custom format pattern (see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)). 如果`format`为 null 或为空字符串 ("")，则对象使用默认格式的输出。If `format` is a null or empty string (""), the object is output using the default format. 下表显示某些格式说明符一起使用时的确切操作，这不同于其行为与一起使用时。The following table shows the exact operation of certain format specifiers when used with , which differs from their behavior when used with . |现有的格式说明符Existing format specifier|新行为New behavior| |-------------------------------|------------------| |“K”"K"|设计往返日期和时间。Designed to round-trip a date and time. 与，映射到"zzz"（偏移量始终显示为带有小时和分钟）。With , maps to "zzz" (the offset is always displayed with hours and minutes). 请注意，"K"自定义格式说明符;它不能显示为单个字符`format`。Note that "K" is a custom format specifier; it cannot appear as the single character in `format`.| |“U”"U"|不支持。Not supported.| |"r""r"|将转换对象为协调世界时 (UTC)，并输出使用自定义格式字符串`ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`。Converts the object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and outputs it using the custom format string `ddd, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT`.| |“u”"u"|将转换为 UTC 值，并输出使用格式`yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`。Converts the value to UTC and outputs it using the format `yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssZ`.| 其余的标准日期和时间格式说明符的行为相同，但有方法像它们对待方法。The remaining standard date and time format specifiers behave the same with the method as they do with the method. 对应于标准格式说明符，以及符号和日期和时间组件的名称模式的定义通过`formatProvider`参数。The pattern that corresponds to standard format specifiers, as well as the symbols and names of date and time components, is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. `formatProvider`参数可以为下列操作之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A表示的格式设置中使用的区域性的对象`input`。A object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in `input`. 返回对象属性定义中使用的格式`input`。The object returned by the property defines the formatting used in `input`. - A定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatProvider`是`null`、使用与当前区域性关联的对象 (请参阅)。If `formatProvider` is `null`, the object associated with the current culture is used (see ). ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法以显示对象用于几个不同的区域性的自定义格式字符串。The following example uses the method to display a object using a custom format string for several different cultures. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/cs/ToString.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.ToString#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.ToString/vb/ToString.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Unix 时间表示自 1970 年 1 所经历的秒数-01-01T00:00:00Z (1，1970 年 1 月 12:00 AM utc)。Unix time represents the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC). 它不会考虑闰秒。It does not take leap seconds into account. 在 Unix 时间，此方法返回毫秒的数。This method returns the number of milliseconds in Unix time. 此方法首先将在其 Unix 及时返回的毫秒数之前的当前实例转换为 UTC。This method first converts the current instance to UTC before returning the number of milliseconds in its Unix time. 早于 1970 年的日期和时间值-01-01T00:00:00Z，此方法返回一个负值。For date and time values before 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z, this method returns a negative value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法就像是方法，但它不会引发异常，如果转换失败。This overload of the method is like the method, except that it does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 分析具有三个元素，可以按任意顺序出现，并且用空白分隔的字符串。It parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space. 下表中显示这些三个元素。These three elements are shown in the following table. |元素Element|示例Example| |-------------|-------------| |\<日期 >\|"2/10/2007""2/10/2007"| |\<时间 >\|"1:02:03 PM""1:02:03 PM"| |\\|"-7:30""-7:30"| 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移量 > 不能单独出现。Although each of these elements is optional, \ cannot appear by itself. 它必须提供一起\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。It must be provided together with either \ or \. 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前日期。If \ is missing, its default value is the current day. 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换到基于值的当前区域性的当前日历中每一年属性。If \ is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the property. 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。If \ is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM. 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。If \ is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone. 如果\<偏移量 > 存在，它可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。If \ is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号，否则该方法将返回`false`。In either case, \ must include a sign symbol or the method returns `false`. `input`通过使用中的格式设置信息分析字符串初始化为当前区域性的对象。The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a object initialized for the current culture. 若要分析包含指定的格式设置，不一定对应于当前区域性的字符串，请使用方法并提供的格式说明符。To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to that of the current culture, use the method and provide a format specifier. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法，以便分析几个不同的日期和时间格式字符串。The following example calls the method to parse several strings with various date and time formats. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParse/cs/TryParse.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParse#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParse/vb/TryParse.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载方法就像是方法，只不过此方法不会引发异常，如果转换失败。This overload of the method is like the method, except that this method does not throw an exception if the conversion fails. 它所分析的字符串表示形式的日期和时间，必须完全匹配指定的模式`format`参数。It parses the string representation of a date and time that must exactly match the pattern specified by the `format` parameter. 如果`input`字符串不匹配此模式，与所定义的空白空间中一些可能变体`styles`参数，在分析操作失败，并且该方法返回`false`。If the `input` string does not match this pattern, with some possible variations in white space defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的模式的自定义格式说明符`input`。The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of `input`. 有关有效格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign. 如果缺少符号，分析操作将失败，该方法返回`false`。If the sign is missing, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成对象分配午夜的时间 (0: 00:00)。If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00). 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成对象分配本地系统上的当前日期。If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting object is assigned the current date on the local system. 如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量，所产生的偏移量对象依赖于的值`styles`参数。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter. 如果`styles`包括，本地时区的偏移量分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the object. 如果`styles`包括，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给对象。If `styles` includes , the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the object. 如果未指定任何值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used. 特定日期和时间符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter. 这同样适用对于精确模式`input`如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符字符串。The same is true for the precise pattern of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string. `formatProvider`参数可以为下列操作之一：The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following: - A表示的区域性的对象在其上基于`input`解释。A object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted. 返回对象属性定义符号，并且中的标准格式允许`input`。The object returned by the property defines the symbols and standard formats allowed in `input`. - A定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。A object that defines the format of date and time data. 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、使用对应于当前区域性的对象。If `formatprovider` is `null`, the object that corresponds to the current culture is used. `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串，指示无显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串分析的方式，并且支持在分析操作的一部分进行 UTC 转换。The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation. 所有成员枚举支持除外。All members of the enumeration are supported except . 下表列出的每个受支持的成员的效果。The following table lists the effect of each supported member. |`DateTimeStyles` 成员`DateTimeStyles` member|行为Behavior| |-----------------------------|--------------| ||分析`input`并且，如果有必要，请将其转换为 UTC。Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC. 它相当于解析字符串，并调用方法的返回对象。It is equivalent to parsing a string, and then calling the method of the returned object.| ||如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量的值，则会为所返回的对象提供的本地时区偏移量。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the offset of the local time zone. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量的值，则会为所返回的对象都提供了的 UTC 偏移量 （+ 00:00）。If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`若要包含内部空白未指定的格式。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by format. 额外的空白区域日期和时间的组件之间和在各个组件，偏移量，以外内可能出现，并分析此字符串时被忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components, other than the offset, and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定的前导空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by `format`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包括尾随空格不指定`format`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by `format`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含前导、 尾随和内部未由指定的空格`format`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by `format`. 中未指定的所有额外空白字符`format`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in `format` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 空白必须出现在完全指定`format`。White space must appear exactly as specified in `format`. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||没有任何作用，因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect, because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法使用标准和自定义格式说明符、 固定区域性，和各种值来分析多个日期和时间的字符串。The following example uses the method with standard and custom format specifiers, the invariant culture, and various values to parse several date and time strings. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact/cs/TryParseExact.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.TryParseExact/vb/TryParseExact.vb#1)]

如果`input`字符串不匹配任一这些模式与定义的任何变体`styles`参数，在分析操作失败，并且该方法返回`false`。If the `input` string does not match any one of these patterns with any variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the parsing operation fails and the method returns `false`. 除了比较`input`到包含格式说明符的多个字符串，此重载行为类似方法。Aside from comparing `input` to multiple strings that contain format specifiers, this overload behaves identically to the method. `formats`参数是一个字符串数组，其元素包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个自定义格式说明符用于定义的可能模式的`input`。The `formats` parameter is a string array whose elements contain either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the possible pattern of `input`. offset value, the returned object is given the UTC offset (+00:00).| ||允许`input`若要包含未指定中的元素的内部空白`formats`。Allows `input` to include inner white space not specified by the elements in `formats`. 额外的空白区域日期和时间的组件之间和在 （除外偏移量） 的各个组件内可能出现，并分析此字符串时被忽略。Extra white space can appear between date and time components and within individual components (except for the offset) and is ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包括前导空格的元素中未指定`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包括中的元素未指定尾随空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include trailing spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 分析字符串时，将忽略这些。These are ignored when parsing the string.| ||允许`input`包含未指定中的元素的前导、 尾随和内部空格`formats`。Allows `input` to include leading, trailing, and inner spaces not specified by the elements in `formats`. 未在中的匹配元素中指定的所有额外空白字符`formats`分析字符串时，将忽略。All extra white-space characters not specified in the matched element in `formats` are ignored when parsing the string.| ||指示该额外的空白区域中不允许使用`input`。Indicates that additional white space is not permitted in `input`. 必须完全按照中的特定元素中指定的方式出现空白`formats`以便成功匹配。White space must appear exactly as specified in a particular element in `formats` for a successful match to occur. 这是默认行为。This is the default behavior.| ||没有任何作用因为结构不包括`Kind`属性。Has no effect because the structure does not include a `Kind` property.| ## Examples 下面的示例定义了多个输入的格式的字符串表示形式的日期和时间和偏移量的值，并随后将传递到用户输入的字符串方法。The following example defines summary.span: Gets a value that represents the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

span.span: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性执行双重转换：The property performs a dual conversion: - 它将转换的日期和时间的当前对象为协调世界时 (UTC)。It converts the date and time of the current object to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 减去的值来执行转换属性的日期和时间的当前从对象。The conversion is performed by subtracting the value of the property from the date and time of the current object. - 它将转换值赋给值。It converts the value to a value. 属性返回值设置为。The property of the returned value is set to . 检索的值的属性等效于调用当前对象的`ToUniversalTime.DateTime`属性，只不过属性后者值是。Retrieving the value of the property is equivalent to calling the current object's `ToUniversalTime.DateTime` property, except that the property of the latter value is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用属性显示值和其相应的 UTC 时间。The following example shows how to use of the property to display a value and its corresponding UTC time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#17)]

summary.span: Gets a object whose date and time are set to the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time and whose offset is .

value.span: 一个对象，其日期和时间是当前的协调世界时 (UTC)，其偏移量为。

span.span: An object whose date and time is the current Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and whose offset is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性计算当前协调世界时 (UTC) 根据本地系统时钟时间与由本地系统时区偏移量。The property computes the current Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) based on the local system's clock time and an offset defined by the local system's time zone. 当前 UTC 时间的毫秒数部分的精度取决于系统时钟的分辨率。The precision of the current UTC time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock. 在 Windows NT 3.5 和更高版本、 和 Windows Vista 操作系统上，时钟的分辨率为大约 10-15 毫秒。On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds. ## Examples 下面的示例阐释了协调世界时 (UTC) 和当地时间之间的关系。The following example illustrates the relationship between Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) and local time. [!code-csharp[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/cs/Properties.cs#18)] [!code-vb[System.DateTimeOffset.Properties#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.DateTimeOffset.Properties/vb/Properties.vb#18)]

summary.span: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current object in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

span.span: Gets the number of ticks that represents the date and time of the current object in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 中的计时周期数对象的协调世界时 (UTC)。

span.span: The number of ticks in the object's Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值属性表示 0001 年 1 月 1 日午夜 12:00:00 以来所经历的 100 毫微秒隔数 (的值)。The value of the property represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00:00 midnight on January 1, 0001 (the value of ). 它不包括将添加闰秒的刻度。It does not include ticks that would be added by leap seconds. 一纳秒等于第二个; 的一个十亿分之一秒第二个有一千万刻度。A nanosecond is one billionth of a second; there are ten million ticks in a second. 值属性范围从`DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks`到`DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`。The value of the property ranges from `DateTimeOffset.MinValue.Ticks` to `DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性的值不影响属性。The property is not affected by the value of the property. 你还可以创建的字符串表示形式通过调用对象的年份部分与"y"、"yy"或"yyyy"自定义格式说明符的方法。You can also create a string representation of a object's year component by calling the method with the "y", "yy", or "yyyy" custom format specifiers. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的年份部分四个不同的方式的值：The following example displays the year component of a value in four different ways: - 通过检索的值的属性。By retrieving the value of the property. - 通过调用与"y"格式说明符的方法。By calling the method with the "y" format specifier. - 通过调用方法使用"yy"格式说明符。By calling the method with the "yy" format specifier. - 通过调用方法带"yyyy"格式说明符。By calling the method with the "yyyy" format specifier.
